title: One Thing - Get One Thing Done
creator: ErgSap Team

extendedInfo.description: Bored with tons of things to do in your todo-list items ? Get One Thing Done !Many of us have tons of todo-list items ... Why not focusing on just one thing to do ?This application does what it says: help you get one thing done.â "One Thing" brings directly in your notification bar your One Item to be done so that you are sure that THIS One thing will be on top of your list and available at your fingertips !Tap on the notification item to open the application and make the task done or define your next task !â This is extremely simple but just efficient: [one thing] + [at your fingertips].â Choose your color to set priority or customization (notification text color is automatically updated in black or white)â Share with friendsHints:-long click to erase text field-single click on text with a strike to erase text-if you update the app, be sure to launch it once to make the notification appear againMore "simple" features are upcoming in next releases.
